attributes.action: ban these petitions as they don't change anything
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think these petitions should be banned as they don't change anything and therefore are only wasting peoples time & money, which burns more electric to run their computers, and therefore polluting the atmosphere. So if these petitions were banned the duty on fuel could be lowered as we wouldn't be producing so much CO2 producing electricity to power the computers to sign pointless petitions.

rejection.details: Such comments on the petition system should be sent to: webmaster@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
